content: right now we have one healthcare application,in that we covered the all The EMR concepts like allergies,vital,problems,medications. etc
with own request and response parameters, now we are trying to change the HL7 Fhir request paramters.but we are new on that Fhir,sa please share the exact parameter any one share please

Exact parmameters for what? What sort of requests are you trying to make. Be sure you've actually read through the spec and the guidelines for asking questions on this chat (http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=FHIR_Rules_for_asking_questions)
